## Read Data / Models


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: read_info

df <- read_csv(
  here('data/processed/example.csv'),
  show_col_types = FALSE
)

mod_lm <- readRDS(here('mods/example.rds'))
```
:::


## Create Plots


::: {#cell-fig-prediction .cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: fig-prediction
#| fig-cap: Relation of hp with mpg.

# create plot
plot_mod <-
  ggplot(
    df,
    aes(
      x = hp,
      y = mpg,
      color = as.factor(gear)
    )
  ) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_abline(
    slope = mod_lm$coefficients['hp'],
    intercept = mod_lm$coefficients['(Intercept)']
  ) +
  labs(
    title = 'Predicted Relation of hp and mpg',
    color = 'Gear'
  )


# show plot
plot_mod
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Relation of hp with mpg.](03_plotting_files/figure-html/fig-prediction-1.png){#fig-prediction width=672}
:::
:::


## Save Plots



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: save_plot
#| eval: false

ggsave(
  here('plots/example.png'),
  plot = plot_mod,
  width = custom_width,
  height = custom_height,
  units = custom_unit,
  dpi = custom_dpi
)
```
:::
